content.query:
-- Shows which disciplines have the deepest team participation.
SELECT
    Discipline,
    COUNT(*) AS TeamCount
FROM teams
GROUP BY Discipline
ORDER BY TeamCount DESC;

-- Shows team depth by nation.
-- Strong team depth predicts strong relay and group performance.
SELECT
    Country,
    COUNT(*) AS TeamCount
FROM teams
GROUP BY Country
ORDER BY TeamCount DESC;

-- Which countries compete heavily in which team sports?
-- This is valuable for nations aiming to strengthen team events in 2026.
SELECT
    Discipline,
    Country,
    COUNT(*) AS TeamCount
FROM teams
GROUP BY Discipline, Country
ORDER BY Discipline, TeamCount DESC;
